In the Server tooling, when creating a new Server, there's an option to download a Server Adaptor (i.e. "Don't see your server listed here? Click here").  It will then go out and contact that vendors eclipse update/discovery site to download their Server adaptor.  If the URL returns (404 page not found), error is written out to .log but the poor user starting at the IDE is left clueless that things have failed.  A dialog or some visual error should be returned to the user that things have failed.
